channel.title: How do i make admins on cheezScape
channel.description: i have my server up and running and i change in the characters my charracters rights to = 3 which is admin but everytime i log in it changes back to 1 and i dont get the admin rights what do i do?

item.title: How do i make admins on cheezScape
item.dc:creator: @xRYUx xRYUx
item.description:
@xRYUx wrote:

  1. Open up you character in the characters folder
  2. Change the playerrights to 3
  3. Open up client.java and search for playerRights = 3
  4. Change “Admin” to your name
  5. Recomile/compile and runserver

Note: Owner’s can’t see crowns next to their name.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make admins on cheezScape

item.title: How do i make admins on cheezScape
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Weird, that okay aslong as your name is admin and make sure "admin"s character rights are at 3 in chars [br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 04:06:06 PM[/size][hr]Oh and btw owners cant see their crowns…so try using a command like ::pickup 0995 10

item.title: How do i make admins on cheezScape
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Go in client.java and search for

playerRights = 3

and you should see

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin"))

Change the “admin” to your characters name.
Save, compile and voila.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 21, 2006, 03:46:29 PM[/size][hr]Make sure he has 3 rights in characters aswell…

Read full topic
